explains: v. 养育（foster 的现在分词）；哺育
wordGroup: foster home 寄养家庭；抚养孤儿的家庭
jodie foster n. 朱迪·福斯特（美国女演员）

sentences.en: We are committed to fostering new music talent.
sentences.cn: 我们致力于培养新的音乐人才。

sentences.en: Vocational schools should do a better job of fostering problem-solving skills and helping students work alongside robots.
sentences.cn: 职业技术学校应该更加努力地培养学生的解决问题能力，以及和机器的协作能力。

sentences.en: If no one owns the resource concerned, no one has an interest in conserving it or fostering it: fish is the best example of this.
sentences.cn: 如果没人拥有相关的资源，就没有人有兴趣去保护或培育它：鱼类就是最好的例子。
